bill_title: require a waiting period if the voters reject a school district bond issue.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require a waiting period if the voters reject a school district bond issue. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-19 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If an election is conducted pursuant to chapter 6-8B and less than sixty percent of the voters of the school district voting upon the question do not vote in favor of issuing the school district bonds for a certain proposition, the school district may not submit a similar proposition to the voters for a period of one year. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
